node.title: 'Less than human': Inquest finds 'contemptuous' attitude to Aboriginal inmate led to avoidable death
node.alt: A young man wearing a cap.
node.description: An inquest into the death of a First Nations man who died after falling 8 metres while trying to escape custody, has found that a "real lack of humanity" by correctional staff contributed to the man's avoidable death.
node.content:
["An inquest into the death of a\u00a0First Nations man\u00a0who died after falling 8 metres while trying to escape custody\u00a0has found that a \"real lack of humanity\" by correctional staff contributed to the man's avoidable death.", "NSW deputy state coroner Elaine Truscott heard that Wiradjuri man Bailey\u00a0Mackander was taken to hospital in November 2019 after he reported\u00a0swallowing\u00a0batteries and razor blades.", "Mr Mackander had been isolated in an assessment or 'safe' cell at Kariong Correctional Centre, where he was reportedly heard screaming\u00a0in distress for two days.", "A decision was made to take him to Gosford Hospital.", "The 20 year old from Port Stephens died after escaping custody, climbing\u00a0over a concrete barrier and falling eight metres.", "", "
The inquest heard there were elders who could have comforted Bailey, but they weren't called.(Supplied)
", "
Treatment questioned
", "The inquest heard the cell Mr Mackander was placed in was deemed unsafe for him as he suffered from anxiety.", "Georgia Lewer, lawyer for Mr Mackander's father and stepmother was scathing in her closing submission.", "\"On numerous occasions, Bailey was dealt with in a contemptuous manner,\" she said.", "\"There was gross disregard for his deteriorating mental state;\u00a0guards stepped over him and entirely ignored him in the cell.", "\"His request for dinner\u00a0is ignored, a request to turn off the TV so he can sleep is ignored.\"", "
Claims of 'crying wolf'\u00a0
", "Paperwork given to treating doctors at\u00a0Gosford Hospital by\u00a0guards stated that Mr Mackander had a habit of 'crying wolf'.", "The inquest heard the language was inappropriate and had the capacity to undermine [hospital]\u00a0treatment Mr Mackander might have received.", "In his closing submission, Bill de Mars, lawyer for Mr Mackander's mother Tracey,\u00a0said that following Mr Mackander's\u00a0treatment, panic set in which resulted in the deceased scaling the ambulance bay wall and falling to his death.", "", "
Bailey Mackander died in 2019 after climbing over a concrete barrier and falling 10 metres.(Supplied: Facebook)
", "\"We find a key motivating factor in the action Bailey took was the fear and anxiety of returning to the observation cell based on his previous distress,\" Mr de Mars said.", "The lawyer for Bailey's father,\u00a0David, and step-mother,\u00a0Melissa, reached the same conclusion.", "\"With the horror of the conditions he thought confronted him in the assessment cell, he may have felt so distressed at the thought of returning,\" Ms Lewer said.", "
Mental healthcare lacking
", "The inquest heard Mr Mackander had anxiety and mental health issues for at least nine weeks prior to his death.", "The inquest heard he was meant to be seen by a psychologist weekly,,which had not occurred.", "The lawyer for a treating nurse said in her submission that \"there was tremendous pressure placed on her client and she didn't have specific mental-health training.\"", "", "
Elaine Truscott\u00a0told the Mackander family Bailey should not have been sent to prison if there was another option available.(ABC News)
", "The inquest heard Bailey had not had a medication assessment or a comprehensive mental health assessment in the lead-up to his death.", "
Call for 'fundamental change'
", "Mr Mackander's family spoke of a kind, loving boy, who sought rehabilitation, despite no\u00a0treatment places being available.", "\"The family wish me to empathise that Bailey was gentle and he was kind. He was still very young, with limited life or jail experience, struggling to find place in the world,\" Ms Lewer said.", "\"It is a problem that requires wholesale\u00a0political and community support, and fundamental change.\"", "Coroner Truscott previously described Bailey as \"a\u00a0beautiful boy in a not-so-beautiful system'.", "Today, she reached out to the family again\u00a0noting that three days had past since the second anniversary of Mr Mackander's death.", "Coroner Truscott will now consider the findings."]
